title: A1990 Speaker issue
message:
Hello, got a MacBook A1990 from a customer the issue is thee left speaker.

Basically he went to another repair store and they replaced 3 times the speaker and all of them sound distorted/buzzing. 
I found a little corrosion around U6400 and replaced it 2 time but I got no differences. 

What else should I check?

title: A1990 Speaker issue
message: Did you test with known good speaker assembly?

title: A1990 Speaker issue
message:
Yes, I tried from my personal speaker and sounds distorted.
It is not a speaker issue sadly but something on the logic

title: A1990 Speaker issue
message:
Check/replace C6411-14 and C6461-64.
Noise comes from tweeter, or woofer?
You can remove corresponding coil, to check each independently.

title: A1990 Speaker issue
message: it comes from the woofer because when I removed the U6400 and tested there was no buzz sound going on.

title: A1990 Speaker issue
message: it is better but not perfect what else can I try?

title: A1990 Speaker issue
message:
one side of R6481 was not well soldered. Fixed the issue. 
Thanks a lot
